category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
definition: The Female Firefighter, Type-3 emoji is a sequence of the ?? Woman, ?? Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-3 and ?? Fire Engine emojis. These ar http://emojipedia.org/female-firefighter-type-3/
name: woman firefighter: medium-light skin tone

bn:00001530n: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

bn:00034631n: Two or more persons trained to put out fires.
An organization whose purpose is to extinguish fires.
A person who puts out fires.
A female person who is trained to put out fires.

A firefighter is a rescuer extensively trained in firefighting, primarily to extinguish hazardous fires that threaten property and civilian or natural populations, and to rescue people from dangerous situations, like collapsed or burning buildings or crashed vehicles.
An individual employed to extinguish fires and rescue people
Rescuer trained to extinguish hazardous fires
Someone (implied male) who is skilled in the work of fighting fire.
A member of a fire department who tries to extinguish fires
A person who is trained to put out fires.

bn:00034652n: A fire engine is a specific vehicle designed primarily for firefighting operations.
Any of various large trucks that carry firemen and equipment to the site of a fire
Any fire apparatus, such as a fire truck or fire engine.

apple_vendor_description: The woman firefighter emoji, rendered with a medium-light skin tone on Apple devices, stands as a symbol of bravery and service, showcasing Apple‚Äôs commitment to diverse representation.  She is depicted in a professional, yet approachable, uniform with clear, crisp details and realistic lighting that highlights the textured fabric and equipment.  The soft, rounded edges of her helmet and gear, a hallmark of Apple's design language, lend a friendly and reassuring quality to this empowering emoji.
